name: Global Game Jam 2021: Lost Treasure Map
name_original: Global Game Jam 2021: Lost Treasure Map
description:
Hi guys! I made this game under the theme of GGJ 2021, Lost and Found.

The game is about treasure hunting at sea using a detector and a shovel. Upgrade props to find the treasure map faster!

Game control:

Left-click to select or lift (when you are using the shovel), right-click to change tools. You have to find 5 pieces of the treasure map on the beach to win.

Some tips:

You HAVE to use the detector to find the treasure first then switch to the shovel to lift it.

Mind the sound. You can hear different sounds while you act, eg. lift nothing/lift something.

Some objects need more than one click to lift out.

Update your detector so you can find treasure easier and distinguish it from different objects.
